author: Mike Angelo
title: Drone Drop Pop-up
projectObjective: Bahlsen asked us to execute an innovative marketing campaign to launch their new branding to promote brand recognition and drive consumers to stores.
mainKeypointDescription: We took over a popular shopping district in Montclair, NJ and filmed a fleet of drones delivering boxes of Bahlsen's products to unsuspecting people walking by. This generated a huge buzz in the region and successfully increased sales.

projectKeypoints.title: A Once-in-a-Lifetime Event
projectKeypoints.description: My team and I worked on numerous different pre-production tasks. We hired drone operators, sketched a rough storyboard, coordinated with a camera crew, and captured a once-in-a-lifetime event.

projectKeypoints.title: Supplemental Digital Marketing
projectKeypoints.description: We developed a rich media marketing campaign to target and retarget potential and repeat shoppers. This included animated and interactive web banners and pre-roll video.

projectKeypoints.title: Social Media Content
projectKeypoints.description: We filmed all preparation before and during the event. Then we delivered numerous video edits and behind-the-scenes bits and ran them on both paid and organic social media channels.

author: Mike Angelo
title: Loopwell: The Space for Well-being
projectObjective: The founders of Loopwell set out to create a unique holistic well-being brand that operates as a wellness ecosystem as well as a production and event venue.
mainKeypointDescription: I worked with the founders and a team to develop a memorable feel-good brand, a powerful website with an event and e-commerce system, and various marketing materials. We successfully cultivated a following and membership and hosted countless seminars, luxury events, and high-quality productions.

projectKeypoints.title: Hit the Ground Running
projectKeypoints.description: While the building was being renovated, we went through a ton of different ideas trying to find the right branding to really carve out a place for us in the space.

projectKeypoints.title: Building a Powerful Site
projectKeypoints.description: We needed an intuitive website that managed events, attendees, memberships, and payments. I helped design and develop the website along with custom integrations and scripts that suited their needs.

projectKeypoints.title: Event Promotion & A/V Production
projectKeypoints.description: I worked with a team to film events, set up live streaming and other production necessities, and compile edits and marketing materials that could be used as promotion for both the event staff as well as the Loopwell brand.

author: Mike Angelo
title: Mercedes-Benz Marketing
projectObjective: Benzel-Busch is known as the premier Mercedes-Benz and Genesis dealer in North Jersey for their exceptional customer service and unique marketing incentives, so naturally they needed automotive advertising that stood out from the noise.
mainKeypointDescription: We delivered numerous award-winning campaigns, commercials, and marketing materials that leveraged Benzel-Busch's outstanding service and unique sales experience, continuing to drive traffic both online and in-store.

projectKeypoints.title: Innovative & Unique Ad Campaigns
projectKeypoints.description: We worked tirelessly to develop new and interesting campaigns that stood out from a sea of APR rates and lease terms. We leveraged Benzel-Busch's unique customer service incentives to get consumers to convert and stay loyal to the brand.

projectKeypoints.title: Monthly Marketing Materials
projectKeypoints.description: Every month we produced marketing materials for new vehicle specials and incentives including organic and paid social media, newsletters, rich media, and print advertising.

projectKeypoints.title: Website Management & Maintenance
projectKeypoints.description: COVID created a surge in online car purchasing, so we had to adjust Benzel-Busch's website to match. We worked with a development team to build a brand new Wordpress site that delivers unmatched value to consumers looking to buy a new vehicle.

author: Mike Angelo
title: Your Home, Your Gym
projectObjective: COVID caused a huge disturbance in the fitness equipment market. As a result, Gym Source was looking to pivot their brand from individual equipment sales to fully developed custom gyms.
mainKeypointDescription: We explored and adjusted Gym Source's branding and messaging, designed and delivered a new website, rich media, commercials, and full-scope advertising campaigns, and reintroduced Gym Source into a new business-to-business market.

projectKeypoints.title: Renewed Website & Brand
projectKeypoints.description: We designed a new website and worked with a development team to build a custom Wordpress site that could handle commercial gym consultations and wholesale equipment information.

projectKeypoints.title: Hard-hitting Ad Campaigns
projectKeypoints.description: We worked with a production team to develop numerous commercial spots that resonated with consumers and brought Gym Source back into the fitness scene.

projectKeypoints.title: Influencer & Television Partnerships
projectKeypoints.description: We partnered with NFL player George Kittle to promote his own Gym Source gym on social media. We also made an appearance on NBC's 'George to the Rescue' and sponsored a custom built unique gym for the show.

author: Mike Angelo
title: Fuel Your Fitness Fire
projectObjective: Blauner Fitness was looking for both a revitalized website and bold advertising campaign to launch a new at-home fitness service.
mainKeypointDescription: I worked with the founder to develop campaign strategies, fresh branding materials, and a new website to revitalize the brand and bring attention to the new services.

projectKeypoints.title: Refreshed Campaign Strategies
projectKeypoints.description: I worked with the owner to develop new marketing strategies for different services he was ready to offer such as in-home personal training and a special GLP-1 fitness program.

projectKeypoints.title: Website and Landing Designs
projectKeypoints.description: I used new photography and brand assets to revitalize Blauner Fitness' out-of-date website with a fresh new look, breakout pages, and FAQ section, and a consultation form.

projectKeypoints.title: Supplementary Marketing Materials
projectKeypoints.description: We ran social media campaigns over the course of 6 months that focused on promoting the new services offered. We also ran mailer campaigns for direct-to-consumer brand awareness.

author: Mike Angelo
title: Seasonal Road Trip Series
projectObjective: Benzel-Busch wanted a new, unique ad campaign that focused on building customers' relationships with the Benzel-Busch brand.
mainKeypointDescription: We developed seasonal campaigns that outlined popular vacation destinations and included a PDF with local attraction guides and accommodations. We highlighted Mercedes-Benz models that would be appropriate for the destination.

projectKeypoints.title: Planning the Road Trips
projectKeypoints.description: We researched and developed seasonal vacation PDFs for consumers to download. These included destinations, local attractions, accommodations, and even some secret destinations the locals missed.

projectKeypoints.title: Integrated Sales Campaign
projectKeypoints.description: We paired different destinations to different vehicles, highlighting the importance of certain features such as AWD or 3-row seating during vacations.

projectKeypoints.title: Supplementary Social Media Content
projectKeypoints.description: We encouraged and promoted Benzel-Busch customers that used their Merdcedes-Benz vehicles for various vacation destinations, and generated more campaign buzz each year.

author: Mike Angelo
title: Hide Them at Home
projectObjective: Advertising was at a stand-still due to COVID, so Bahlsen asked us to quickly come up with a campaign that would capitalize on the silence.
mainKeypointDescription: We came up with a fun campaign about the struggle of having to share your favorite snacks with others during COVID lockdowns.

projectKeypoints.title: Planning the Road Trips
projectKeypoints.description: We researched and developed seasonal vacation PDFs for consumers to download. These included destinations, local attractions, accommodations, and even some secret destinations the locals missed.

projectKeypoints.title: Integrated Sales Campaign
projectKeypoints.description: We paired different destinations to different vehicles, highlighting the importance of certain features such as AWD or 3-row seating during vacations.

projectKeypoints.title: Supplementary Social Media Content
projectKeypoints.description: We encouraged and promoted Benzel-Busch customers that used their Merdcedes-Benz vehicles for various vacation destinations, and generated more campaign buzz each year.

author: Mike Angelo
title: EV Incentives & Protection Plan
projectObjective: Benzel-Busch developed an electric vehicle upgrade program and a protection plan program, and had asked us to create a small campaign to build awareness around their launch.
mainKeypointDescription: We developed two mini-campaigns. The first campaign interviewed actors exaggerating common electric vehicle myths to highlight the ease of switching to an EV. The second campaign showed silly but plausible situations where you may need extra protection on your vehicle.

projectKeypoints.title: Planning the Road Trips
projectKeypoints.description: We researched and developed seasonal vacation PDFs for consumers to download. These included destinations, local attractions, accommodations, and even some secret destinations the locals missed.

projectKeypoints.title: Integrated Sales Campaign
projectKeypoints.description: We paired different destinations to different vehicles, highlighting the importance of certain features such as AWD or 3-row seating during vacations.

projectKeypoints.title: Supplementary Social Media Content
projectKeypoints.description: We encouraged and promoted Benzel-Busch customers that used their Merdcedes-Benz vehicles for various vacation destinations, and generated more campaign buzz each year.
